title: Re: What animal are you?
content:
I'm gargoid. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mort.gif[/img]

This poll is pointless, there's [insert correct big number here] animals on this planet and this poll has three opinions, and two fictional species.
Oh, yeah, and I doubt none of us are animals. Or well, at least most. I can easily imagine a dog trying to use a keyboard and trying to post something that makes sense..Eat your veggies!

title: Re: What animal are you?
content:
A well trained dog that hardly ever drools anymore.

Interestingly enough, I'm a mouse, you won't believe how hard it is to type, running over to each key, then pushing down with both paws. And the spacebar and return keys! You have to jump to press 'em! And don't ask about capitals.

And using the computer mouse> Do you have any idea how hard it is to move? I end up looking like some oversexed labrat. Then there's the volume knobs and settings on the speakers and monitor, last week I was setting the volume and some twit played the start tune, deaf for an hour!



A proud member of the signature stealing society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Mod2.jpg[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: What animal are you?
content:
Trogdor was a man!
I mean, he was a dragon-man!
Maybe he was just a dragon!
But he was still TROOOGDOOOOOOR!

Dragons are silly!

Actually I think I myself am human... or maybe what my avatar says.Retodon8
You live, you die, you are remembered, you are forgotten. [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Graphics/Keen_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]

title: Re: hummingbird:
content:
*At Harvey's house...*

Harvey: Mom, whats a vorticon?

Harvey's mom: Where did you hear that?

Harvey: On the PCKF. Its just that they have blue fur, and I have blue fur, and-

HM: Harvey, there's something I should tell you about your father... he, he wasn't really killed in a car crash.

Harvey: But...?

HM: He was killed by the grand intellect during the takeover of Vorticon VI; I guess I have a lot of explaining to do...

Harvey: Is that why I always drool?

HM: No dear, that was me dropping you as a baby.


A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

title: Re: Dwaggins all the way! ^.-.^
content:
They stalk and murder small innocent animals, especially endangered ones, which they think are tasty, and young ones, which they think will increase their sexual potency. They are ungrateful inbred miserable vicious vermin.

Dragons are ok, so long as they're a good distance away. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-birthday.gif[/img] A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society
